entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
